description:
runtime: fix race builders
Do not run Syscall benchmarks under race detector,
they split stack in syscall status.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=01ca60884c6f ***

runtime: fix race builders
Do not run Syscall benchmarks under race detector,
they split stack in syscall status.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12093045

On 2013/07/30 18:14:11, dvyukov wrote:
> *** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=01ca60884c6f ***
> 
> runtime: fix race builders
> Do not run Syscall benchmarks under race detector,
> they split stack in syscall status.
> 
> R=golang-dev, rsc
> CC=golang-dev
> https://codereview.appspot.com/12093045

Why did this commit remove so many benchmarks?

It didn't remove anything; it split one file into two. The diff is showing
both files diffed against the original. Everything should be deleted from
one or the other but nothing should be deleted from both.

subject: code review 12093045: runtime: fix race builders
